menuItemSaveQuote.description: Title of the context menu item that saves the selected text when clicked.

btnHighlightQuote.description: A button that highlights all occurrences of the quote on the page.

mnuHighlightQuote.description: A menu item button that highlights all occurrences of the quote on the page. Needs to be short for proper display.

btnCopyQuote.description: A button that copies a quote to the user's clipboard.

btnDeleteQuote.description: A button that deletes a quote.

QuoteCopiedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteCopied.message: The quote has been copied to your clipboard.
QuoteCopied.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user copies a quote to their clipboard.

QuoteDeletedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user deletes a quote.

QuoteDeleted.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user deletes a quote.

NoQuotesYet.message: No Quotes Yet for This Page
NoQuotesYet.description: Title shown in the sidebar when the current page does not have any saved quotes.

NoQuotes_GetStarted.message: Get started by selecting text on this page to save quotes.
NoQuotes_GetStarted.description: Paragraph shown in the sidebar when the page does not have any saved quotes yet.

CloseDialog.description: Caption for screen readers to close a dialog.

DefaultSuggestion.message: Start typing to find a Quote
DefaultSuggestion.description: Shown when the user activates the extension omnibox.

ViewSavedQuotes.description: Browser action hover title. Takes the user to the homepage showing saved quotes on any webpage.

QuoteAddedTitle.description: A title shown in a notification when the user creates a new quote from highlighted text on a webpage.

QuoteAddedMessage.message: Access the quote in the quote sidebar (CTRL+Q).
QuoteAddedMessage.description: A paragraph shown in a notification when the user creates a new quote from highlighted text on a webpage.

btnAnnotate.description: Title for the button; when clicked, opens an input text box for the user to type notes about the quote.

HighlightThisQuote.description: button title shown when covering over the selector that set the highlight color of quoted text.
